r.d: This is a DataSource driver for Structures_DataGrid using PEAR::DB_DataObject.
r.n: - Request #7753: better and more explicit support for fetching links, with new link_level and link_property options - Request #10625: new link_keep_key option - New fields_order_property option - Deprecated the formbuilder_integration option, keeping BC. Same behaviour can be achieved with link_level and fields_order_property - Fixed reference assignment warnings under PHP 4.4 - Removed dependency on DB_DataObject_FormBuilder - Updated other dependencies
